div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 960 Didymotichon, Thrace, c. 1870-1875 (327) Burial: early 1st cent. B.C. (T) Contents: c. 20 AR Maroneia: 3-4 spread-flan ? tetradr. Thasos: 16-17 spread-flan ? tetradr., chiefly imit. Disposition: unknown Tacchella, RN 1898, pp. 214-5 Tacchella includes as part of the same lid. the thousand 4th cent. fractions of no. 738 above but it seems almost certain that two separate finds are involved
